name: Coursera Machine Learning Assignments
body:
### Introduction
These assignments were for Andrew Ng's Machine Learning course in [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning). There are several programming assignments from the course, and I'm working on it in Octave(which is officially used by the course) and Python

### Status
Finished til Week4 which means 3 assignments so far.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
